prompt: I'm building an AI-powered resume builder that automatically tailors resumes based on the job description by analyzing keywords and improving phrasing to match recruiter expectations.
I want to create a blockchain-based system that stores land ownership records on a public ledger, making property rights transparent, tamper-proof, and reducing fraud in land transactions.
I have an idea for a fitness tracking app controlled entirely by voice — ideal for people who exercise hands-free or visually impaired users, integrating with smartwatches and earphones.
I'm planning an online marketplace that only lists sustainable fashion brands — all products must pass eco-certification standards and provide transparency in material sourcing and labor ethics.
I want to develop a mental health chatbot specifically designed for college students, combining CBT techniques with anonymous peer support and 24/7 conversational therapy.
My idea is to offer drone-based delivery for rural areas where logistics infrastructure is weak — especially targeting small pharmacies and grocery suppliers who need last-mile access.
I'm working on a subscription box that sends monthly kits for home gardening — with seeds, instructions, and seasonal recommendations, aimed at urban dwellers with minimal experience.
I want to create a crypto wallet for kids, allowing parents to assign digital allowances while teaching children basic financial literacy through gamified tasks and savings goals.

I'm building a virtual coworking space in VR, where remote workers can collaborate in real-time in 3D environments, with rooms for focus, meetings, or casual hangouts — accessible via browser or headset.
I plan to launch a mobile app that uses AI and your phone camera to detect plant diseases in real-time, offering farmers instant diagnosis and suggestions for treatment and prevention.
